name: Señor Pacbomber
description:
The unholy combination of PacMan and Bomberman. El Señor Pacbomber. For the Bevy Jam #2

- Arrow Keys for Navigation

- `Space` to drop a bomb

- Your goal is to kill the enemies in each level with your bombs and collect as many coins as possible

The music will sound weird for the first ~4 seconds and then its fine. Seems to be a wasm issue.

The source code can be found here
